text:
FGSZ Ltd. partner name: TIBIEL EOOD

 

Dear Partner!

I am contacting you on behalf of FGSZ Ltd.

Every two years the FGSZ Ltd. asks the opinion of its partners in the form of a questionnaire about the Company's activity. The research greatly helps the Company to find out the opinion of its partners on its operations and the standards of its services. 

Based on the suggestions from previous researches, the FGSZ Ltd has taken several measures in order to improve the standards of its services.  

FGSZ Ltd has commissioned the Szocio-Gráf Institute to conduct the research wave of 2023. In the attached document you may find the request letter signed by the management of FGSZ Ltd.

On behalf of FGSZ Ltd, we are asking you to participate in the current wave of the research, by filling out an online questionnaire! The questionnaire contains questions about the Company's services.

You may fill out the questionnaire by clicking the link below. 

https://cloud.capitris.hu/szociograf/survey/RBPENG23?uid=ZLA7N287&nostartpage

Filling out the questionnaire takes approximately 20 minutes. If you start the questionnaire, but for some reason you have to cancel it, you have the possibility to continue it at a time that is more suitable for you. The system will continue the questionnaire from the point where it was cancelled.

In case you have any questions or remarks about the questionnaire, please send a message to zgyorky@szociograf.hu!

Please find the time to fill out the questionnaire until - if possible – 11. July 2023.!

Thankfully: Zoltán Györky project manager 

                                                                                                       Szocio-Gráf Institute

subject: FGSZ Ltd.  partner survey 2023.
